I moved the installation to C:\JUnit

I think the JUnit team should caution people about this problem in 
the FAQ
(How do I install JUnit? )
How can we tall them ?

Thanks again.

Your e_mail address doesn't work from France, so i use the group to 
answer you.




>Sent: Friday, December 06, 2002 1:39 AM
>Subject: Fwd: [junit] Digest Number 708
> I'm glad to know that I could help.  I had a terrible time finding 
out the
> original problem.  Did you happen to try just using quotes?  Or 
did you
> move the installation directory like I did?
>
> -Rob




--- In junit@y..., "jlmrodriguesfr" <jlmrodriguesfr@y...> wrote:
> Thanks so much, it works now...
> I received one answer to my question and  it was  a good one
> :-))
> 
> 
> --- In junit@y..., "rab6687" <Rob_Biedenharn@a...> wrote:
> > Although you don't say where you installed your JUnit, I suspect 
> that 
> > you have the same problem that I did.  I originally installed 
> > in "C:\Program Files\JUnit\" and got the same error no matter 
how 
> I 
> > tried to run the JUnit self-tests.  Eventually, I found someone 
> who 
> > said that the ClassLoader has trouble with spaces in the 
> directories 
> > in the CLASSPATH.  Trying to use "C:\Progra~1\JUnit\" wasn't any 
> > better, but moving the entire directory to "C:\Junit\" did the 
> > trick.  I was later told that just putting quotes around the 
> > CLASSPATH directories should be sufficient, but I never went 
back 
> to 
> > try that.
> > 
> > -Rob
> > 
> > --- In junit@y..., "jlmrodriguesfr" <jlmrodriguesfr@y...> wrote:
> > > I would like to know why i have this error.
> > > 
> > > See below what i did and the result :
> > > Thanks,
> > > 
> > > 1)unzip the junit.zip file 
> > > add junit.jar to the CLASSPATH.
> > > 2)test the installation by using either the batch or the 
> graphical 
> > > TestRunner tool to run the tests that come with this release. 
> All 
> > > the tests should pass OK. 
> > > 2.1 )the batch TestRunner type: 
> > >     java junit.textui.TestRunner junit.samples.AllTests 
> > > 
> > > result ==>
> > > Microsoft Windows XP [version 5.1.2600]
> > > (C) Copyright 1985-2001 Microsoft Corp.
> > > 
> > > C:\>java junit.textui.TestRunner junit.samples.AllTests
> > > .........................................
> > > .........................................
> > > ................F....E.................
> > > Time: 2,623
> > > There was 1 error:
> > > 1) testJarClassLoading
> (junit.tests.runner.TestCaseClassLoaderTest)
> > > java.lang.Clas
> > > sNotFoundException: junit.tests.runner.LoadedFromJar
> > >         at junit.runner.TestCaseClassLoader.lookupClassData
> > > (TestCaseClassLoader.
> > > java:124)
> > <snip/>
> > > FAILURES!!!
> > > Tests run: 119,  Failures: 1,  Errors: 1
